item.description:
Hello raw folks!

Please join us in a celebration of all things chocolaty, fruity, lovely, and delicious just in time for Valentine's Day. Our own Arlene has invited everyone to enjoy an evening at her home on top of Munjoy Hill in Portland.

We thought a V-Day theme would be fun, and while chocolates, tarts, pies, and cakes are highly encouraged :) , feel free to bring whatever you'd like to share, however simple or extravagant.

Also, if anyone wants to start a raw food "book club", bring a few book titles that you're interested in reading and discussing. We can take a vote during our gathering and figure out which one we're most excited to begin with.

Let me know if you have any questions, comments or ideas. I look forward to meeting you all in a few weeks.

Take care!
Nicki

Note: Those who RSVP yes will be emailed the exact location of this meetup.

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: February Potluck!
